property.value: When a hero or ally in your party deals damage, add an arena counter.; [Activate], Remove three arena counters > Put up to three target cards from one player's graveyard on the bottom of his deck

property.value: Draenei Hero Required; 1, [Activate] > Draenei in your party have +1 ATK this turn.

property.value: Orc Hero Required; [Activate] > Target Orc in your party has ferocity this turn.
